alert.note: Alert for Collin; Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 11:45AM CDT until April 13 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northwestern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Southwestern Lamar County in north central Texas... Delta County in north central Texas... East central Collin County in north central Texas... Southeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1144 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located from Farmersville to Leonard, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Commerce, Farmersville, Leonard, Cooper, Wolfe City, Celeste, Cumby, Campbell, Bailey, Cooper Lake Park Doctors Creek, Roxton, Ladonia, Pecan Gap and Neylandville. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 95 and 105. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.

area.areaDesc: Collin; Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar
